content: As far as the Buckeyes losing 16 starters goes, it will be tough to do so, but there’s a lot to look forward to as well. Recruiting in the Urban Meyer era has been some of the best in OSU history. That’s why I have them at Number 8 in my official Two Cent Sports Power Rankings! Check them out here https://twocsports.wordpress.com/2016/07/26/way-too-early-ncaa-football-top-25/
